title: Bonus - Front Office Focus with David Samson (Football 10/10)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by former Expos and Marlins president David Samson to uncover the behind-the-scenes angle of firing a coach as well as detail what it takes to tank. You can subscribe to David's new daily podcast called 'Nothing Personal with David Samson,' available on all podcast platforms now. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: David Samson has a new podcast, as Will Brinson chats with him about front office happenings in the NFL.
